content.rendered:
Access the new phonebook here.

Offices and Services

  • Office of the President
  • Office of Civic and Community Engagement
  • Office of Diversity and Inclusivity
  • Office of General Counsel
  • Office of Institutional Research
  • Office of Research and Sponsored Programs
  • Office of Strategic Communications
  • Office of University Advancement
  • Capital Planning, Facilities, and Space Management
  • Commencement Services
  • Convocation Services
  • Sustainable Campus Consortium

Administrative Resources

  • Office of Human Resources
  • Office of Financial and Business Services

Academic Resources

  • Office of the Provost
  • Office of the Registrar
  • Academic Advising
  • Academic Success Center
  • Center for Teaching and Learning
  • Faculty Governance
  • Faculty Handbook
  • Graduate Academic Services
  • Institutional Review Board
  • La Verne Academy

Employee Resources

  • Campus Store
  • Abraham Campus Center
  • Campus Parking
  • Dining Services
  • Graphics, La Verne
  • Mail Services
  • Office of Information Technology

Digital Resources

  • Banner Access Center
  • Copyright
  • Dynamic Course Catalog
  • Dynamic Schedule
  • Faculty and Staff Webmail
  • La Verne Portal
  • MyLaVerne/Banner SSB
  • Wilson Library

Wellness and Safety

  • Student Outreach and Support
  • Campus Safety
  • Counseling and Psychological Services
  • Health Services
  • Step Up! Bystander Interventional Program
  • Title IX Sexual Misconduct Resources
